item.title: Emacs – tools for fun and glory
item.description: Emacs Customizations everyone should have What minor modes do you always use? Excluding web browsers, what are your most used non-terminal programs in i3? So many packages, can’t stop myself! Ten Tools for Academics Rubén Berenguel: More emacs configuration tweaks (multiple-cursor on click, minimap, code folding, ensime eval overlays
